name: Social Media Monitoring
description: Tracking, analyzing, and extracting intelligence from social media platforms.

cards.title: Trend Tracking and Hashtag Monitoring
cards.description: Identifying emerging trends and real-time intelligence from social media.
bulletpoints: Use Twitter API and sentiment analysis for trend detection
Track hashtags and geotagged posts for live event monitoring
Identify influencers and key opinion leaders in information networks

cards.title: Profile Attribution and Fake Account Detection
cards.description: Identifying and verifying user profiles across multiple platforms.
bulletpoints: Cross-reference accounts using username correlation techniques
Analyze profile behavior and post timing for bot detection
Use reverse image searches to trace profile pictures and avatars

cards.title: Geotag Tracking and Location Intelligence
cards.description: Extracting geolocation data from social media content.
bulletpoints: Use EXIF metadata to extract GPS coordinates from images
Analyze geotagged tweets and Instagram posts for real-time location tracking
Cross-reference location data with Google Earth and OpenStreetMap

cards.title: Deepfake and Manipulated Media Detection
cards.description: Identifying and analyzing AI-generated and manipulated media content.
bulletpoints: Use tools like Deepware Scanner and Sensity AI to detect deepfakes
Analyze inconsistencies in facial movements, lighting, and reflections
Compare suspected deepfake videos to original source footage

cards.title: Telegram Intelligence Gathering
cards.description: Extracting intelligence from Telegram channels and groups.
bulletpoints: Use tools like Telegago and TGStat to search and analyze public channels
Monitor extremist groups and underground marketplaces
Identify admin locations and network structures in encrypted groups

cards.title: Dark Social Monitoring
cards.description: Tracking information shared through private social media channels.
bulletpoints: Analyze encrypted platforms like Signal and WhatsApp using metadata analysis
Use link shortening analytics to track hidden URL shares
Monitor Discord and private Facebook groups for threat intelligence

cards.title: Scraping Twitter Data Without an API
cards.description: Extracting real-time intelligence from Twitter without API restrictions.
bulletpoints: Use Twint for Python-based Twitter scraping
Monitor deleted tweets and sentiment changes over time
Analyze Twitter spaces and voice chat logs for intelligence gathering

cards.title: Creating and Managing Sockpuppet Accounts
cards.description: Building effective alias accounts for covert research and engagement.
bulletpoints: Use identity obfuscation techniques to prevent tracking
Simulate natural activity to avoid platform bans
Use disposable email and phone numbers to create persistent personas

cards.title: Extracting Intelligence from Reddit
cards.description: Using Reddit’s vast discussion networks for OSINT investigations.
bulletpoints: Use Pushshift.io for historical Reddit data analysis
Track subreddit activity related to underground markets and extremist groups
Analyze deleted comments and user post histories

cards.title: YouTube Data Analysis for OSINT
cards.description: Extracting intelligence from YouTube videos and user behavior.
bulletpoints: Analyze metadata, upload history, and geotagged locations
Track user engagement and comment sentiment for trend analysis
Reverse-search YouTube thumbnails for origin tracking

cards.title: Sentiment Analysis for Social Media
cards.description: Analyzing public sentiment and behavioral shifts through social media posts.
bulletpoints: Use AI-based NLP tools like VADER and TextBlob for sentiment analysis
Detect propaganda campaigns and disinformation trends
Track spikes in emotional engagement to predict social unrest

cards.title: TikTok Intelligence Gathering
cards.description: Extracting intelligence from TikTok videos and user interactions.
bulletpoints: Track geolocation and engagement metrics for emerging trends
Use TikTok’s API and OSINT tools to monitor influencer activity
Analyze comments and hashtags for political or social sentiment shifts

cards.title: Monitoring Private Facebook Groups
cards.description: Gaining intelligence from closed and private social networks.
bulletpoints: Analyze engagement patterns in restricted Facebook communities
Use group metadata and admin tracking for lead generation
Identify coordinated misinformation campaigns and threat actors

cards.title: Dark Web Social Media Monitoring
cards.description: Tracking criminal and extremist networks on dark web forums.
bulletpoints: Use Tor-based search engines to locate hidden forums
Analyze dark web marketplaces and social networks
Cross-reference darknet user activity with surface web accounts
